In my signature I've got a link to my thread in the Spacecraft Exchange, I'd like to get that link condensed into a single word (like "Link" for example) rather than show up as the whole web address, and I have no idea how to do that.

Thanks.

Edited February 19, 2016 by WhiteKnuckle

Do you know how to do that in a regular post? In a signature it's exactly the same. Use the 'link' button (the icon that looks like a small piece of chain).

It's a rather common issue with the crappy WYSIWYG editor.

Edited February 19, 2016 by Tex_NL
Thank you sir, since the forum update I've been pretty lost.
